snippet: Six Chinese citizens have had their assets frozen in conjunction with an S.E.C. case claiming they traded improperly in the shares of a China-based pork processing company.
abstract: Six Chinese citizens have had their assets frozen in conjunction with an S.E.C. case claiming they traded improperly in the shares of a China-based pork processing company.

headline.main: S.E.C. Charges Six Chinese Citizens With Insider Trading
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing | Investing: Assets Of 6 Chinese Investors Frozen In Insider Case
